Package com.pubg.utils

Class PubgUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pubg.utils.PubgUtils
  • public class PubgUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains method to manage PUBGM External files which is provided by method ContextWrapper.getExternalFilesDir(java.lang.String).
    Since:
    2021
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rahil khan

                      boolean isRooted)
        Runs the pre-compiled native code (cpp).
        Parameters:
        cpppath - The path of the cpp
        isRooted - boolean specifying weather to run cpp as root
        Returns:
        true if cpp is executed successfully, false otherwise

      • activateFirewall

        public boolean activateFirewall​(android.content.Context context)
        Blocks the IP address on which the client listen at lobby. This reduces server side ban in lobby deactivateFirewall(Context) ()} must be called after entering or exiting the match or game.
        Returns:
        true only & only if version is korean & ports are blocked successfully, false otherwise

      • deactivateFirewall

        public boolean deactivateFirewall​(android.content.Context context)
        Unblocks all the IP address which are blocked by the method activateFirewall(Context).
        Returns:
        true only & only if version is korean & ports are blocked successfully, false otherwise

      • startPUBG

        public boolean startPUBG​(android.content.Context context)
        Starts the game
        Returns:
        true if VERSION is installed, false otherwise
